TitlePage.Title: NoCK
TitlePage.Subtitle: Computing obstruction for the existence of compact Clifford-Klein form
TitlePage.Author:
Maciej Bocheński
mabo@matman.uwm.edu.pl

Piotr Jastrzębski
piojas@matman.uwm.edu.pl http://wmii.uwm.edu.pl/~piojas/

Anna Szczepkowska
anna.szczepkowska@matman.uwm.edu.pl

Aleksy Tralle
tralle@matman.uwm.edu.pl http://wmii.uwm.edu.pl/~tralle/

Artur Woike
awoike@matman.uwm.edu.pl http://wmii.uwm.edu.pl/~awoike
TitlePage.Abstract: In this package we develop functions for an algorithm designed to find homogeneous spaces of semisimple non-compact Lie groups which do not admit compact Clifford-Klein forms.
